songs.title: 2Pac’s Tattoos
songs.lyrics:
A body map of 2Pac's tattoos, starting from the neck, working around and down to his back

Neck:

• Makaveli
Chest:

• 2Pac

• 2 Die 4
Waist:

• 50 Niggas

• Thug Life
Left Arm:

• Black Panther Head

• Burning Jesus on Cross

• Only God Can Judge Me

• Outlaw
Right Arm:

• West Side Skull

• M.O.B

• Heartless Skull

• My only fear of death is coming back reincarnated

• Notorious
Back:

• Boss Playaz Crown

• Fuck the World

• Exodus 18:31 Cross

• Smile Now Mask

• Cry Later Mask

• Ballin
